Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. Given its high-quality features and unparalleled performance, it is valued at $15,000 by us. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to acquire it at an attractive price of $12,000. This offer is designed to provide you with substantial savings while ensuring you receive the best value for your investment. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed with this exciting opportunity. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
